有一说一，从任何一个角度说，奴隶制真不是生产力最高的制度，相反是一种极为原始落后的制度，有效率极低且难以维持等特点。很多大拿已经有过相关论述了，可以参考下面的论文。
1.Domar, Evsey D. The Causes of Slavery or Serfdom: A Hypothesis. The Journal of Economic History. March 1970, 30 (1): 18–32. JSTOR 2116721.
2.Lagerlöf, Nils-Petter. Slavery and other property rights. Ideas. repec.org. 2006-11-12 [2009-05-06].
3.Technology. History.com. 2008-01-04 [2009-05-06]. .
4.John R. McKivigan; Mitchell Snay. Religion and the Antebellum Debate Over Slavery. University of Georgia Press. 1998-11-01: 68– [2012-05-31]. ISBN 978-0-8203-2076-2.
5.Charles L. Griswold. Adam Smith and the Virtues of Enlightenment. Cambridge University Press. 1999: 198– [2012-05-31]. ISBN 978-0-521-62891-4.
6.Bryan Caplan. Economics of Slavery Lecture Notes. [2014-10-17].
